name: Simplifine
headline: AI-Powered Workspace for Research
description:
Research workflows are broken, forcing researchers to cobble together disconnected tools for literature review, writing, data analysis, and more—tools not designed for their needs.

Simplifine changes everything. Built by researchers, for researchers, it equips you with AI agents that act like JARVIS from Iron Man, capable not only of connecting and analyzing information but also running computational experiments and simulations. Our specialized LLM Agents can design and execute complex research experiments with PhD-level expertise, compressing weeks of work into minutes. With Simplifine, you no longer need to juggle fragmented tools—everything from advanced simulations to data analysis happens in one place.
tags: industry:ai-enhanced-learning; industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:productivity; industry:consumer-products; industry:note-taking; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Ege Kaan Duman, Founder
founders.description: Rhodes Scholar from Turkey. DKU, Duke, and Oxford alumnus. Musician, poet, cook. I like flowers & watering my flowers. cat & dog enjoyer but mostly fat cat enjoyer.

founders.name: Ali Kavoosi, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Ali is the CTO and founder of Simplifine. He has extensive background in optimising AI models, from putting them on Deep Brain Stimulators to speeding up training/inference on GPUs.

generated_description:
### Simplifine: Revolutionizing Research Workflows

**Company Overview**  
Founded in 2024 and based in San Francisco, Simplifine is transforming the research landscape with its AI-Powered Workspace aimed specifically at academics. Operating under the umbrella of Y Combinator's Batch S24, the company is a trailblazer in making research more efficient.

**The Problem Simplifine Solves**  
Researchers often find themselves drowning in a sea of disconnected tools for literature reviews, data analysis, and writing. Simplifine addresses this chaos head-on. Designed by researchers for researchers, it offers a cohesive suite that integrates various processes into one streamlined platform.

**What Simplifine Offers**  
Picture having an AI assistant akin to JARVIS from Iron Man at your fingertips. Simplifine introduces specialized LLM Agents that can design and execute complex research experiments with the precision of a PhD-level expert. Tasks that used to take weeks can now be accomplished in just minutes.

**Key Features**  
1. **Unified Academic Search**: Search across multiple platforms like arXiv and Semantic Scholar simultaneously and compare results in real time.
2. **Smart Reference Management**: Effortlessly import and organize your research material with customizable folders and easy citation features.
3. **Custom Data Tables**: Use AI to extract and analyze key data points from your literature.
4. **AI-Powered Literature Reviews**: Generate comprehensive reviews quickly by asking targeted research questions.
5. **AI Research Assistant**: Engage in meaningful dialogues about your research, complete with visualizations and simulations.

**Mission & Vision**  
Simplifine’s mission is clear: to simplify the research process. By providing powerful AI tools, they hope to modernize the academic research experience, tackling inefficiencies and enhancing productivity.

**Team & Leadership**  
With a compact team of just two members, Simplifine is agile and focused. They also have the esteemed Michael Seibel as their Group Partner, guiding their strategic direction.

**User-Centric Design**  
The platform is designed to be user-friendly, ensuring that researchers can dive in without needing robust technical expertise. Plus, it’s free to use, making it accessible for everyone from doctoral students to seasoned researchers.

**Privacy & Data Security**  
Security is a top priority. Simplifine employs enterprise-grade encryption, ensuring that all user data remains confidential and under their control.

**Conclusion**  
Simplifine is a breath of fresh air for the academic community. By integrating AI into research workflows, it's not just about making tasks easier; it’s about redefining the entire research experience. If you're tired of juggling multiple tools and want to focus on what really matters—your research—then it might be time to check out [Simplifine](https://www.simplifine.com).

In a world rich with information and yet rife with disorganization, Simplifine stands out as an essential ally for researchers determined to simplify their journey and amplify their impact.
